title: Higher education spending as a share of GDP worldwide 2016 , by country
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of GDP on the Y-axis for 39 different Countrys for 2 groups Public, and Private that are presented on the X-axis.
Country Norway had the maximum Share of GDP among all 2 groups, and it was for Public. The minimum Share of GDP was observed in Country Luxembourg for Private.
Country Norway and Germany had the biggest gap of 17.0 between the highest and lowest Share of GDP found for Public.
On average, the Country Chile had the highest Share of GDP for all 2 groups Public, and Private. Whereas Luxembourg had the lowest average Share of GDP.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 39 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups Public, and Private. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of GDP.
Country Norway had the maximum Share of GDP among all 2 groups, and it was for Public. The minimum Share of GDP was observed in Country Luxembourg for Private.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of GDP on the Y-axis for 39 different Countrys for 2 groups Public, and Private that are presented on the X-axis.
Country Norway had the maximum Share of GDP among all 2 groups, and it was for Public. The minimum Share of GDP was observed in Country Luxembourg for Private.
Country Norway and Germany had the biggest gap of 17.0 between the highest and lowest Share of GDP found for Public.
On average, the Country Chile had the highest Share of GDP for all 2 groups Public, and Private. Whereas Luxembourg had the lowest average Share of GDP.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 39 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups Public, and Private. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of GDP.
For Country Norway, Public had the highest Share of GDP 18.0 among the 2 groups and in Luxembourg, Private had the lowest Share of GDP 0.0.
For Country Norway, Public had the maximum Share of GDP and it saw the lowest in Country Germany out of all 39 Countrys.
The maximum Share of GDP for Public that was found in Country Norway was 18.0 times larger than the minimum Share of GDP observed in Country Germany.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Share of GDP was found in case of Public.
On average, the Country Chile had the highest Share of GDP for all 2 groups Public, and Private. Whereas Luxembourg had the lowest average Share of GDP.
